sentences: Yumiko Urabe (占部 由美子, Urabe Yumiko, born 1959) is a Japanese pianist who started playing when she was five years old.
Later on, she enrolled in the Tokyo University of the Arts in Tokyo and then studied with Klaus Schilde before graduating from the Hochschule für Musik und Theater München with a master's degree.
By 1988 became a teacher there before being promoted to professor in 2006.
She was a prizewinner at the José Iturbi Competition in Valencia and the GPA International Piano Competition in Dublin.
She has performed in Japan, Korea, Taiwan, and throughout North America except Mexico.
